title: Poster, "The Omen", 1976–1977
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On white background, a black-and-white photograph of a little boy, standing with legs apart, his head replaced by an engraved Baroque monster. At lower center is the title "OMEN / glosny horror amerykanski", with further credits at lower left and lower right.
